subject: Attention  Aaron
body:
Attention  Aaron
We have been instructed to release your Consignment Box containing the
sum of $3.5million, that this Unit of U.S. Customs and Border Protection
seized, which has been 
in our custody for a long time due to your
inability to provide the Clearance certificates, which you were asked to
obtain from Africa were the fund was transferred from.
You are fortunate after our investigation last month the US Department
of States instructed that we should release all the fund that U.S. Customs
and Border Protection seized to their owners in this First quarter of the
year 2024, so you are therefore advised to come or send your representative
to this office to claim your fund immediately.
You are advised to comply immediately, Below is the office address.
U.S.Customs and Border Protection.
Office of Investigations SAC Offices
SAC Washington, DC
2675 Prosperity Avenue
Fairfax, VA 22031
reply to this email
Urgent get back to us: 
uscustom06@gmail.com
Faithfully Yours
Mr.John Wagner
The Executive Director of Admissibility and Passenger Programs with U.S.
Customs and Border Protection

subject: Re: Attention  Aaron
body:
Hello Wagner,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm thrilled to hear about this unexpected news! However, I must admit, I'm a bit confused. Could you please clarify a few things for me?

Firstly, could you explain why my box was seized by the Customs and Border Protection? And what exactly is in this box that's related to Africa?

Secondly, you mentioned something about needing a Clearance from Africa. What kind of clearance are we talking about here? 

Lastly, could you provide more details about the process of claiming my fund? Do I need to physically come to your office or can it be done remotely?

I appreciate your patience and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Etta

subject: Re: Attention Aaron
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some more details?

Best wishes,
Etta
